verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
God is good all the time.
He put a song of praise in this heart of mine.
God is good all the time.
Through the darkest night, His light will shine.
God is good; God is good all the time.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If you're walking through the valley,
And there are shadows all around.
Do not fear; He will guide you.
He will keep you safe and sound.
He has promised to never leave you
Nor forsake you, and His word is true.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We were sinners and so unworthy,
Still for us He chose to die.
Filled us with His Holy Spirit,
Now we can stand and testify
That His love is everlasting,
And His mercies, they will never end.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Though I may not understand
All the plans You have for me,
My life is in Your hands,
And through the eyes of faith
I can clearly see that

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Bueno es Dios, siempre fiel,
Puso un canto nuevo en mí corazón.
Bueno es Dios, siempre fiel,
en la oscuridad brillará su amor.
Bueno es Dios, Bueno es Dios,
Siempre es fiel.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Sí tu vas por el valle y hay sombras alrededor,
dile a adiós al temor, pues seguro en Él estás.
Prometió nunca dejarte, ni abandonarte,
y Él no mentirá.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Y aún sin merecele su sangre derramó por mi.
Me llenó de su presencia y ahora puedo compartir:
Que su amor nunca termina
Y su favor siempre me dará.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
No puedo entender tus planes para mí.
Mí dueño eres Tú, y por la fe veo claramente
